column1: Narauli is a town and a nagar panchayat in Sambhal district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.
Narauli is located at 28.5°N 78.72°E﻿ / 28.5; 78.72. It has an average elevation of 186 metres (610 feet).

column3: 682. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Narauli has an average literacy rate of 25%
column4: lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 31%
column5: and female literacy is 18%. In Narauli
column6: 19% of the population is under 6 years of age.
